biotools.summary: LBEEP (Linear B-Cell Exact Epitope Predictor) is a perl based open source tool for the prediction of Linear B-cell epitopes. Please refer the article tilted "Harnessing Computational Biology for Exact Linear B-Cell Epitope Prediction: A Novel Amino Acid Composition-based Feature Descriptor" for more deatils.

bioschemas.name: LBEEP
bioschemas.summary: LBEEP (Linear B-Cell Exact Epitope Predictor) is a perl based open source tool for the prediction of Linear B-cell epitopes.
